name: VNTrackingRequest
desc: The abstract superclass for image analysis requests that track unique features across multiple images or video frames.

items.name: var inputObservation: VNDetectedObjectObservation
items.desc: The observation object defining a region to track.

items.name: var trackingLevel: VNRequestTrackingLevel
items.desc: A value for specifying whether to prioritize speed or location accuracy.

items.name: var isLastFrame: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates the last frame in a tracking sequence.
